solution_correctness.description: Accuracy of the final answer provided by the agent.

reasoning_traceability.description: Ability to trace and understand the reasoning process of the agent.

data_contamination_avoidance.description: Ensuring the agent's response is not influenced by pre-existing internet data.

logical_step_count.description: Number of logical steps taken to reach the conclusion.

diversity_of_steps.description: Variety of different approaches and strategies used in solving the question.

brute_force_avoidance.description: Ability to answer the question without exhaustive search or trial-and-error methods.

solution_efficiency.description: Efficiency of the process taken to reach the solution, considering time and resources used.

confidence_in_solution.description: Level of confidence the agent has in its provided solution.

explainability.description: Clarity and understandability of the solution's explanation.

novelty_of_solution.description: Degree to which the solution is novel or unique.
